Description: Allows you to modify the order and the acronyms of the role mentions of the game (and the keywords too if you feel like it). For support join <color=blue>https://discord.gg/ht8ttc3R8E</color>

CheckboxSettings.Name: Modify keywords too.
CheckboxSettings.Description:
This will:
1. Add the keywords (the mentions that appear with ':') to the base file
2. Apply the changes from the modded files to the keywords.
Requires you to dump the files again.
